title: The Art director
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
brief_description: Explains the work of the art director in the production of a feature motion picture. Shows how motion picture sets are designed and constructed and indicate the research necessary to make them authentic. Suitable for Mid-Secondary and above students. No other credits available.
creator_credit_for_label: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
